name: Pecan Pie Bites from Scratch
author: Yoly
summary: A family favorite during the holidays. Easy to prepare and a fun dessert to make with kids.
ingredients: ½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
directions: Beat butter and cream cheese for crust with an electric mixer until smooth
Add flour and mix until fully combined
Cover and refrigerate dough for 1 hour
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Spray a 24-cup mini-muffin tin with nonstick spray
Whisk brown sugar, egg, melted butter, and vanilla for filling in a bowl until smooth
Roll dough into twenty four 1-inch balls
Press each ball into a muffin cup, so it spreads evenly on the bottom and up the sides
Sprinkle about 1 teaspoon pecans into each muffin cup, then top with about the same amount of egg mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until filling is set, 25 to 30 minutes
Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes, then remove from the muffin tins
